00035 // privileges checking
00036 $can_read = utility::havePrivilege('stock_take', 'r');
00037 $can_write = utility::havePrivilege('stock_take', 'w');
00038 
00039 if (!($can_read AND $can_write)) {
00040     die('<div class="errorBox">'.__('You don\'t have enough privileges to access this area!').'</div>');

00043 // show only current user stock take item flag
00044 if (isset($_GET['listShow']) && $_GET['listShow'] == '1') {
00045     $show_only_current = 1;
00046 }
00047 
00048 // check if there is any active stock take proccess
00049 $stk_query = $dbs->query('SELECT * FROM stock_take WHERE is_active=1');
00050 if ($stk_query->num_rows < 1) {
00051     echo '<div class="errorBox">'.__('NO stock taking proccess initialized yet!').'</div>';
00052 } else {
00053     // check view mode
00054     $view = 'e';
00055     if (isset($_GET['view']) AND $_GET['view']) {
00056         $view = trim($_GET['view']);
00057     }
00058 ?>
00059     <fieldset class="menuBox">
00060     <div class="menuBoxInner stockTakeIcon">
00061         <?php
00062         if ($view != 'm') {
00063           echo __('STOCK TAKE PROCCESS - Insert Item Code/Barcode with keyboard or barcode scanner').'<hr />
00064               <form name="stockTakeForm" action="'.MODULES_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'stock_take/stock_take_action.php" target="stockTakeAction" method="post" style="display: inline;">
00065               <div><div style="width: 140px; float: left;">'.__('Item Code').':</div><input type="text" id="itemCode" name="itemCode" size="30" /> <input type="submit" value="'.__('Change Status').'" class="button" /></div>
00066               <div style="margin-top: 3px;"><div style="width: 140px; float: left;">'.__('List stocktakes by').':</div>

00069               <iframe name="stockTakeAction" style="width: 0; height: 0; visibility: hidden;"></iframe></div>

00085 <?php
00086     /* CURRENT STOCK TAKE ITEM LIST */
00087     // table spec
00088     $table_spec = 'stock_take_item AS sti';
00089 
00090     // create datagrid
00091     $datagrid = new simbio_datagrid();
00092     $datagrid->setSQLColumn('item_code AS \''.__('Item Code').'\'',
00093         'title AS \''.__('Title').'\'',
00094         'coll_type_name AS \''.__('Collection Type').'\'',
00095         'classification AS \''.__('Classification').'\'',
00096         'IF(sti.status=\'e\', \''.__('Exists').'\', IF(sti.status=\'l\', \''.__('On Loan').'\', \''.__('Missing').'\')) AS \'Status\'');
00097     $datagrid->setSQLorder("last_update DESC");
00098 
00099     $criteria = 'item_id <> 0 ';
00100     // is there any search
00101     if (isset($_GET['keywords']) AND $_GET['keywords']) {
00102         $keyword = $dbs->escape_string(trim($_GET['keywords']));
00103         $words = explode(' ', $keyword);
00104         if (count($words) > 1) {
00105             $concat_sql = ' (';
00106             foreach ($words as $word) {
00107                 $concat_sql .= " (title LIKE '%$word%' OR item_code LIKE '%$word%') AND";
00108             }
00109             // remove the last AND
00110             $concat_sql = substr_replace($concat_sql, '', -3);
00111             $concat_sql .= ') ';
00112             $criteria .= ' AND '.$concat_sql." AND status='".$view."'";
00113         } else {
00114             $criteria .= " AND (title LIKE '%$keyword%' OR item_code LIKE '%$keyword%') AND status='".$view."'";
00115         }
00116     } else {
00117         $criteria .= " AND status='".$view."'";
00118     }
00119     if (isset($show_only_current)) {
00120         $criteria .= ' AND checked_by=\''.$_SESSION['realname'].'\'';
00121     }
00122 
00123     // set criteria
00124     $datagrid->setSQLCriteria($criteria);
00125 
00126     // set table and table header attributes
00127     $datagrid->table_attr = 'align="center" id="dataList" cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0"';
00128     $datagrid->table_header_attr = 'class="dataListHeader" style="font-weight: bold;"';
00129     // set delete proccess URL
00130     $datagrid->delete_URL = $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'];
00131     $datagrid->column_width = array('10%', '60%', '10%', '10%', '10%');
00132     $datagrid->disableSort('Current Status');
00133 
00134     // put the result into variables
00135     $datagrid_result = $datagrid->createDataGrid($dbs, $table_spec, 20, false);
00136     if (isset($_GET['keywords']) AND $_GET['keywords']) {
00137         $msg = str_replace('{result->num_rows}', $datagrid->num_rows, __('Found <strong>{result->num_rows}</strong> from your keywords')); //mfc
00138         echo '<div class="infoBox">'.$msg.' : "'.$_GET['keywords'].'"</div>';
00139     }
00140 
00141     echo $datagrid_result;
00142     /* main content end */
00143 }
00144 ?>
